briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of the Venous Window Needle Guide to Access Arteriovenous (AV)Fistulae
officialTitle: Vital Access Venous Window Needle Guide for Salvage of AV FistulaE (SAVE) Trial
summary: The SAVE Study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Venous Window Needle Guide in achieving access of a deep, un-cannulatable arteriovenous fistula to complete hemodialysis as prescribed.

primaryOutcome.measure: Use of Venous Window Needle Guide to Obtain Arteriovenous Access for Hemodialysis
